column5: put some scillicone on a few rivets today around noon. Still very wet. how long till it's good?

Depends on the type of silicone, but I would give it a full 24 hours to make sure it cures complete and adheres. Could always throw a hairdryer for about 15 min or even a spot light on it for a hour or sot to help speed it up.. But not to hot. Basically to hold the temp at about 80-90 degrees and that will knock the cure time in half.
